body:
hey @nisrulz thanks for this app. it helped a lot. using it on my flutter apps.

cheers buddy, keep it up!
Thankyou for your work, it helped so much on making my app
Awesome job here👏👏

Thank you very much for your website ;)

Can I help to build it for french version ?
Just coming back to say that this is a great project, keep up the good work!
Thanks! I'm using it for my first iOS app and if it works out I'll use it for more in the future! :) You saved me a lot of time!
@nisrulz thanks for this app. Appreciate it.
@nisrulz  thanks you very much for your apps . i appreciate it
thanks @nisrulz
Enjoy coffee! Thanks for your work :)
Thankyou for your work
Well done! Thank you! It helped a lot. Using it on my flutter apps.
Awesome privacy policy generator! Thank you!
You have done a good job, I used it in almost every application developed by my (78+counting ;) ), Thank you very much for your efforts Nishant and other contributors.
Hi @nisrulz thanks for policy generator. Can you include Godot privacy policy in that please.
Thanks! :)

Thanks Nishant! 
Your generator is really quick, efficient, and concise!
Спасибо. Привет с Казахстана XD

Thanks a lot for your great generator. Have already used it in several apps and have just seen it being used in a random freemium app from the play store while I was implementing one of your policies in my app. What a coincidence...
I think your policies are already famous.
:purple_heart:
Thanks For The Help, Hope You All The Best
Thanks I'm using it for Sign for Spotify on the Google Play Store.
Great work! Thank you!
Great work. Many Thanks....
I used it to for my new app. Once app is published, will share the name here. But great work. Much appreciate it !
Hi @nisrulz  thanks for policy generator. Will you please add e-commerce policies like refund and cancellation policies.

> Hi @nisrulz thanks for policy generator. Will you please add e-commerce policies like refund and cancellation policies.

Please open a separate issue for your questions. This issue is for a different purpose. Thank you 🙏🏼
thanks
Hi @nisrulz , many thanks for your policy generator, great job! I used it to create Privacy Policy and Terms of Service for my app. It worked flawlessly.
Hi @nisrulz, The Policy Generator is awesome! Well Done! Keep it up!
Awesome generator! thank you!
Absolutely amazing! Thank you so much.
Thank you!
this is amazing. Thank you so much!
It is perfect. Thank you!)
Thank you so much for this!!!
Awesomeness!
Such a life saver!
Sign in here to say thank you! Your work is much appreciated.
Great work! Thank you!
thank you bro
great work bro, thanks for the amazing tool
Thank you very much. Really saved my day.
Thank you so much, the generator was really helpful and easy to use!
Amazing tool
Thank you! It is a irreplaceable tool for indie developer.
Your tool is very good
Thanks !
Absolutely incredible !! This was the one thing I was so scared of and it was so easy!  Thank you for existing!!!!
thumbsUp for creating it. this saved me a lot of time.
Kudos! Truth be told this has helped out a ton.
thx
I used it in my mobile game, you made scary legal things easy
Great work! I just bought you a cup of ☕. Just curious, did you make the website from scratch or with a builder?

> Great work! I just bought you a cup of . Just curious, did you make the website from scratch or with a builder?

@odonc I built it from scratch. You can check the commit history 😄 It is small side project which I built it very quickly at the time, when Google made the privacy policy mandatory.
Hey, I use the app literally in each of my app. Thank you for making the website. Clean and minimal user interface is a 👍👍👍
This is amazing. Much appreciated. Slick and simple, has assisted me now and I'm sure will again in the near future. You rock.
Awesome job!! Thank you for maintaining this app, it has been useful to me and I am sure it will continue to be so in the future as well. Great user interface and functionality! 🙌🏻
Your work is greatly appreciated!!
thank you
Thanks a lot. Your work is greatly appreciated!!! Cheers!
This tool is great, I'm using it for my little toy Android app I'm publishing on the Play store!

Thanks for this tool, it helped me generate Terms & Conditions as well as Privacy Policies for my new password manager, although I would have to give it a go, I won't have to write it all. Thanks for having this app up and running!
Thanks
Love this! Great work

Hi @nisrulz, thank you for the APP privacy policy and terms and conditions.
I loved it,
Thank you for your privacy policy tool
Thanks for your great contribution. You are very kind
Amazing man!!! A great contribution.
You did an awesome job, Thanks!
Thanks for the work buddy, such a handy tool! Keep it up
hi  thanks
Thank you for an awesome tool. Keep it up!
This tool is amazing. Really helped me a lot. Thank you so much!

**Thanks you very much**
# Amazing tool
Thank you. amazing tool for quick relese :)
Thank you. We used for our app which called `A Yay Paw`
good
Thank you
nice work
Great app, potentially speaking
Thank you for creating your policy generator! It made my life easier :)

Dude,

Thanks for your helpful service!
I have two apps on Google Play and this privacy policy made Google Play store happy!

https://coffey.buzz/AndroidApps/KittyPoker/PrivacyPolicy.html
https://coffey.buzz/AndroidApps/DistanceToTheAlamo/PrivacyPolicy.html

Thanks!
Patrick
Georgia, USA
Seriously a helpful resource for all responsible wannabe financially solvent coders....
Thanks a lot brother
Thanks for this
Hey Nishant, Thanks for this wonderful project. It has certainly helped me to create the privacy policy in just two steps...  Awesome !!!
Thanks!!! What a wonderful job!! Congrats!
Thank you :) . I hope you (and everyone else) are having a lovely day.
Thank you very much
Thanks man. it's very useful
Thank you very much

Thanks !!! it was very useful. I went to some website but after filling up some forms they asked for money. 
Great Job !!!!!!
Great Job Nishant.
Hi @nisrulz thanks for policy generator.
Thank you very much for the private policy

Such an awesome work you did!!
I (And a lot of others) really appreciate your hard work!
Thank you!!
Thank you a lot!
Thank you so much, buddy :)
